title: Questions to ask
body:
When I publish the contract successfully, execute the command:
```
go run cmd/main.go genesis l2     
--deploy-config ../packages/contracts-bedrock/deploy-config/getting-started.json     
--deployment-dir ../packages/contracts-bedrock/deployments/getting-started/    
 --outfile.l2 genesis.json   
  --outfile.rollup rollup.json   
  --l1-rpc https://rpc.ankr.com/eth_goerli/
```
Return error:
t=2023-10-23T11:26:47+0000 lvl=info msg="Deploy config" path=../packages/contracts-bedrock/deploy-config/getting-started.json
t=2023-10-23T11:26:47+0000 lvl=info msg="Deployment directory" path=../packages/contracts-bedrock/deployments/getting-started/
t=2023-10-23T11:26:47+0000 lvl=crit msg="Application failed"   message="cannot find deployment: L1StandardBridgeProxy"
exit status 1
But the contract (L1StandardBridgeProxy) has been released successfully

getting-started.json:
